pr_title: Avoid to call add/addAll on a potentially unmodified collection

timeline.bodyText: Minimal nitpick: The other branches of the conditional add their result to the list, that is initialized in line 66. Would it be an option to use the same approach here? If not, this is ok, just indicate so.
timeline.author: matthiasblaesing

replies.bodyText: Yes, it makes sense: now all uses of res variable just add items to it.
replies.author: digiovinazzo

timeline.message:
Fix bug when adding to the potentially unmodifiable collection returned by original.select(URI).

Also always add to the res variable created at the beginning of the method.

Fix bug when adding to the potentially unmodifiable collection returned by original.select(URI).

Also always add to the res variable created at the beginning of the method.
